page.title: 20RELIGION
page.content: There are people of many different religions living in the{Meadows.}There are{Christians, Muslims, Hindus, {Buddists and Sikhs.}There are six Christian churches and the Salvation Army building but other people have to go to other parts of Nottingham to worship. When{Christians}go to church they sing hymns, say prayers and talk about the{Bible. Hindus}take off their shoes before they go into their temple. The {Maraj}tells a story then they say prayers, do art and then have{Parshad. When{Sikhs}go to the temple, they wear their new clothes, take their shoes off and cover their head.{Muslims}go to the mosque to pray. They take off their shoes and sit on a mat.
